text: aap pochiye ke aasmaano aur zameen ka parvardigaar kaun hai ? keh dijiye Allah, keh dijiye kya tum phir bhi us ke siva auro ko himaayati bana rahe ho jo kuch apni jaan ke bhi bhale bore ka eqtiyaar nahi rakhte, keh dijiye ke kya andhaa aur bina baraabar ho sakta hai ? ya kya andheriya aur roshni baraabar ho sakti hai, kya jinhe ye Allah ke shareek tehra rahe hai unhone bhi Allah ki tarah maqlooq paida ki hai ke un ki nazar mein paidaish mushtaba ho gayi ho, keh dijiye ke sirf Allah hee tamaam chizo ka khaaliq hai, wo akela hai aur zabardast ghaalib hai
